criteria: Authentication logic passes security code review. No secrets in config files. DirectX PoC results are conclusive and documented. Service reliability script is functional.
tools_used: Manual Code Review, Static Analysis Tools, GPU Profiler
success_metrics: Zero critical security vulnerabilities. A clear path forward for the viewer is defined.

criteria: RBAC prevents unauthorized access for all tested cases. Session lock is non-bypassable and preserves application state. User management business rules (last admin) are validated.
tools_used: Automated E2E Tests (Appium), Manual Security Testing
success_metrics: 100% of RBAC test cases pass. Session lock feature meets HIPAA requirements.

criteria: C-STORE SCP can receive studies from an external toolkit without data loss. RabbitMQ DLQ mechanism correctly handles processing failures. PACS configuration UI is functional and C-ECHO works.
tools_used: dcmtk, RabbitMQ Management UI, Test PACS
success_metrics: System can ingest DICOM data reliably. Message queue resiliency is validated.

criteria: PHI Redaction in logs is validated to be 100% effective for all tested PHI types. Audit trail is comprehensive and viewer is functional. E2E Query/Retrieve workflow is successful.
tools_used: Log analysis tools, Automated E2E Tests, Test PACS
success_metrics: Zero PHI leakage in logs. Full traceability via audit trail is demonstrated.

criteria: DICOM viewer meets performance targets for image loading (<3s) and interactive manipulation (<500ms response). No GPU resource leaks detected after a 1-hour stress test. Core viewer tools are intuitive.
tools_used: GPU Profiler, Stopwatch timing, User Acceptance Testing
success_metrics: All performance NFRs for the viewer are met.
